name: Behavioral Health
description: Mission House's partners, the UCSF Citywide Roving Team and the California Institute for Integral Studies provide behavioral health services including intensive behavioral health case management and therapy. Staff and students from both organizations actively engage residents and hold office hours, onsite, giving residents the opportunity to participate in behavioral health services in the comfort of their homes. The Roving Team also coordinates with Property Management to keep residents stabili
